sections.heading: Poet Laureate.The Governor may appoint a Poet Laureate for Delaware to serve at the pleasure of the Governor
sections.text:
The Poet Laureate shall perform such duties as may be requested by the Governor or the Secretary of State or their designees.29 Del. C. 1953,
§

 4401;54 Del. Laws, c. 267;57 Del. Laws, c. 608,

§

 6;70 Del. Laws, c. 186,

§

 1;72 Del. Laws, c. 352,

§

 1;
